post.author: elusive
post.body:
Hey guys!

I want to present you a SP project I'm currently working on with my partner "Psychokiller" from the Doom3 RTH team. We've been working on it for 2 weeks now and have some stuff we'd like to show you

Here is a short description of the story:
The "Soul Gems" are three mystic stones. Every stone stands for a virtue and gives the player a specific amount of power. Without knowing it Tommy is the key to these stones and gets into a deadly game that threatens the fate of earth.
The player can look forward to fighting against the aliens again in atmospheric levels with varied gameplay and an exciting story that ties in with Prey.

And here are some screens. Hope you like them

http://img421.imageshack.us/img421/4821/sgemakx7.jpg
http://img464.imageshack.us/img464/9617/sgembyg3.jpg
http://img464.imageshack.us/img464/7704/sgemczr6.jpg
http://img474.imageshack.us/img474/787/sgemdhx3.jpg
http://img160.imageshack.us/img160/8500/sgemeys7.jpg
http://img177.imageshack.us/img177/4917/sgemffx3.jpg

If you have any suggestions don't hesitate to ask

post.author: Tron
post.body: Looks pretty cool, look like shots straight out of the game. So minus a couple of points for looking just like the game, but add them back on since people were complaining about it being too short anyway so adding on extra levels is a good thing.

post.author: der_ton
post.body: Singleplayer map, yummy! Looking forward to it!

post.author: hArk
post.body:
I found different gravity combat tricky (which was hardly utilised in single player)
I.e. 1 on floor other on wall or roof

But upside down on same plain of gravity I have no problems :/


You have my intrest in the single player map

post.author: BJA
post.body:
2 weeks ? wow, that`s pretty fast...and pretty good looking
The story description sounds interesting. Looking forward to this one.
But please don`t put in too many up and down gravity gameplay...I`ve got really dizzy from that stuff

post.author: elusive
post.body:
Thanks for your comments! I'd like to show you something new I did a few days ago

http://img165.imageshack.us/img165/2985/shot00046bh7.jpg

post.author: der_ton
post.body:
I changed your embedded image to a url, the 1680x1050 slightly exceeds the allowed 640x480 size here.

Very Doom3-ish architecture, it looks a little dark though.

post.author: elusive
post.body:
der_ton wrote:
I changed your embedded image to a url, the 1680x1050 slightly exceeds the allowed 640x480 size here.


Oh I'm sorry. I'll remember next time

Yeah the brightness ... it looks quite bright ingame but at a screenshot it doesn't. Making it to jpg also influenced the brightness I think ;(

post.author: aardwolf
post.body: Hehehe, like if there was need for more evidence that prey modding is dead, a prehistoric thread about modding prey gets necro'ed by a spambot.

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body: Actually, they necro threads all over the forums. You just managed to catch a glimpse of the mess I clean up on what seems like a daily basis.

post.author: id_sonic
post.body: just say no
